title: Ep. #22 | CRUSH, X1, and PARK JIMIN
description:
Daebak Fam - we are back this week with another episode, covering Crush’s “NAPPA”, X1’s “FLASH”, and Park Jimin’s “STAY BEAUTIFUL”.   Make sure to tune in to some pressing news at the end of the show (aka Eric’s plans for Halloween). Does anyone besides Diane know what Animal Crossing is? Also, Eric shares with us why he no longer has his favorite bears from his childhood.   Let us know your best Halloween costume ideas for Eric!   Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave us a comment, rating and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Soundcloud, or YouTube.   Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at https://divestudios.io/show/daebakshow/!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
